name: Remasteroids
description:
REMASTEROIDS

This is a remake of the classic game Asteroids for an University project. It was made in C++ withRaylib. The objective of the game is to shoot and destroy asteroids avoiding colliding with the fragments that detach from them. 

.Enemys:

Three asteroids of different sizes and a strong Spaceman.

.Power Ups: 

The Spaceman give you a new weapon for 7 seconds.  When you kill an asteroid, you have a 5% chance of earning an extra life.

.Controls: 

Acelerate with right click and shoot with left click.

I hope you enjoy it! Leave in the comments your highscore!
